Summary: hovered light flashed red/white faded in/out moved
trends: There have been 67 other sightings in Louisville

divs: sighting detailsi first saw it on sat.aug 31st at about 9:30 then agian on sun sept 1st sametime it,done different things both times.it hovered in the distance at least amile away,it looked like a ball flashing from off white to red.as if it werespinning,at times it was more red.it just hovered there,then after about 15minuts it faded out.then it reapered in another spot not far from where it wasto begin w\.but this time it was lower.a long way off but u could c it just overthe tree tops.then it seemed to get futher and futher away slowly.watched itabout an hour both times.
